function_description: Add or edit comments on a card
initial_state: User is viewing a card in the card view with the comments section visible.
steps: Start writing in the comment box.
Press `Ctrl` + `Enter` or click `Add comment` button to post.
To edit, click the `pencil` icon on an existing comment.
To delete, click the `bin` icon on an existing comment.
expected_state: Comments are added, edited, or deleted, with the comments section reflecting these changes.
